abilities.name: Reach For The Sky!
info: Woody has close-range Basic Attacks and long-range Heavy Attacks.

When Woody hits an enemy target with a Heavy Attack, he places a Warrant on it that lasts for 5 seconds. (Max Stacks: 1) Enemies with a Warrant cannot gain or grant Attribute Buffs. Enemies cannot receive a new Warrant until the old one expires.
The projectile from Woody's Heavy Attack can only hit one target at a time, but its Push Back effect is 3 times as strong.

abilities.name: Sheriff'S Roundup
info: Woody's combat target is Pulled to him, from any distance.
Woody deals 300% damage and inflicts Knock Back on the Pulled target.
If the combat target has a Warrant, it is Stunned for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: A Friend In Me
info: Woody’s Special Ability deals an additional 200% damage.
Whenever an enemy with a Warrant is defeated, all allies gain a 15% Attack Buff that lasts until the end of the encounter. (Max Stacks: 4)
Whenever an enemy with a Warrant is defeated, all other allies have a 50% chance to Heal 10%.

talents.name: Roundup Gang
talents.info: Grants an additional 10% Attack at the start of an encounter to Woody and any other Melee or Ranged Guardians in his team, while Woody is in the encounter.

talents.name: Protective Posse
talents.info: Grants an additional 10% Health at the start of an encounter to Woody and any other Tank or Support Guardians in his team, while Woody is in the encounter.

talents.name: Frontier Justice
talents.info: If Woody’s combat target has a Warrant or is Villainous, Woody’s Basic and Heavy Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.

talents.name: Snakeboot Venom
talents.info: Enemies Pulled by Woody have a 60% chance to be inflicted with a Stifle Debuff for 10 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1] If the Pulled target has a Warrant or is Villainous, this chance increases by an additional 40%.

talents.name: Cleaning Up This Town
talents.info: Whenever an enemy gains a Warrant, Woody has a 60% chance to Cleanse one Attribute Debuff from all allies. For each of Woody’s allies that are Leaders, the chance to Cleanse increases by an additional 20%.

talents.name: Favorite Deputies
talents.info: Basic and Heavy Attacks from all other allies deal an additional 100% damage against enemies with a Warrant. Whenever an enemy with a Warrant is hit by Woody’s Heavy Attack, it gains Lure for 5 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1]
